name: final-project-lafoucc
description: With the rise of AI-generated art, platforms like Civitai have become go-to sources for unique, artist-created images and models. This project uses data scraped from Civitai to make it easy to explore and discover both images and LoRA models in a natural, chat-based interface. The app learns your preferences over time to recommend images and LoRA models that align with your interests.
